description: Shadow Hunter character definitions - Base game characters

ability.name: Teleport
ability.description: Once per game, may move to any Area instead of rolling dice.

ability.name: Defense
ability.description: When attacked, can counterattack immediately dealing 1 damage.

ability.name: Diagnosis
ability.description: At the start of your turn, you may pick a player and privately learn if they are a Shadow or not.

ability.name: Exorcism
ability.description: Once per game, pick a player. If that player is a Shadow, they receive 2 damage.

ability.name: Leadership
ability.description: Once per game after moving, you may pick any one player and move them to your Area.

ability.name: Demolition
ability.description: You can use the Demolition ability: pick a player in the same Area and give 3 damage, but receive 2 damage yourself.

ability.name: Bloodthirst
ability.description: Once per game, at the start of your turn, you may give 1 damage to any player and heal 1 damage.

ability.name: Unearthly Speed
ability.description: After attacking, if you killed a Hunter or Neutral, heal 2 damage.

ability.name: Soul Steal
ability.description: When attacked, the attacker takes 1 damage.

ability.name: Wither
ability.description: You may give 1 damage to a player and 1 damage to yourself.

ability.name: Copy
ability.description: When revealed, you may copy another revealed player's ability.

ability.name: Vengeance
ability.description: If you are ever reduced to 0 HP, deal 3 damage to your killer before dying.

agnes.name: Agnes
agnes.win_condition: Be the one to kill a 3-letter named character (Bob, Emi).

ability.name: Vendetta
ability.description: Win by killing a 3-letter named character.

allie_n.name: Allie (Neutral)
allie_n.win_condition: Kill another player or be killed by another player.

ability.name: Lover
ability.description: Win by killing or being killed by another player.

bryan.name: Bryan
bryan.win_condition: If no Neutral wins, you must be alive when the game ends.

ability.name: Survivalist
ability.description: Win by surviving to the end if no other Neutral wins.

catherine.name: Catherine
catherine.win_condition: Be the first player to equip the Holy Robe and Chainsaw.

ability.name: Hoarder
ability.description: Win by equipping both Holy Robe and Chainsaw.

daniel.name: Daniel
daniel.win_condition: You must be the first player to kill, or be killed.

ability.name: Stalker
ability.description: Win by being the first to kill or be killed.

emi.name: Emi
emi.win_condition: Be either dead, or have 5+ HP when the game ends.

ability.name: Blessed
ability.description: Win if dead or at 5+ HP when game ends.

fu_ka.name: Fu-ka
fu_ka.win_condition: Your team wins when you are neither the first nor the last to die.

ability.name: Ghostly
ability.description: Win by not being the first or last to die.
